revision.text:
{{Actor| | type = Ammo | name = Mini missiles | class = MiniMissiles | game = Strife | doomednum = 2046 | spawnid = 141 | spawnname = T_ROCKETBOX | convid = 182, 176, 180 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:Inventory|Inventory]]→[[Classes:Ammo|Ammo]]→[[Classes:MiniMissiles|MiniMissiles]]→CrateOfMissiles
A box of twenty mini-missiles for the [[Classes:MiniMissileLauncher|mini-missile launcher]]. Not to be confused with Doom's own [[Classes:RocketBox|box of rockets]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR CrateOfMissiles : {{Class|MiniMissiles}} { {{Property|Inventory.Amount}} 20 {{Property|Tag}} "$TAG_CRATEOFMISSILES" // "Crate of Missiles" {{Property|Inventory.PickupMessage}} "$TXT_CRATEOFMISSILES" // "You picked up the crate of missiles." States { Spawn: ROKT A -1 Stop } }
